issue.title: [Go] use Go-1.12 in CI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5246](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5246). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
we should bump our CI for Go to the new Go-1.12 version.
